greeting: Hey! How can I help you today?
help: I'm here to help! What do you need?
Sure, what can I do for you?
What do you need help with?
negation: Alright, let me know if you need anything!
joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
What do you get when you cross a snowman and a vampire? Frostbite!
Why was the math book sad? It had too many problems!
weather: I can’t check the weather right now, but maybe try a weather app!
It might be sunny, rainy, or something in between! Check your weather app for the details!
name: I'm your friendly assistant!
Just call me Assistant!
I'm here to help with whatever you need.
age: Age is just a number, but I’ve been here as long as you need me!
I don’t age, but I’m always learning.
